name: Kalki, Inc.
description: Developer of a financial platform designed to transform payroll transactions. The company's platform uses decentralized finance (Defi) technology to perform real-time and continuous streams of payments with the support of blockchain technology, enabling users to stream their payroll money to compliant cryptocurrency and convert it into real cash.
one_liner: Developer of a financial platform designed to transform payroll transactions. The company's platform uses decentralized finance (Defi) technology to perform real-time and continuous streams of payments with the support of blockchain technology, enabling users to stream their payroll money to compliant cryptocurrency and convert it into real cash.
